summary: A retexture for the various daedric weapons found in the game except the bow.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vCYIn0d.png[/img]
[size=2]By Aiyen [/size]
[center][size=5][img]http://i.imgur.com/x73jz4I.png[/img][/size][/center]
A full retexture of all the deadric weapons. The style deviates from vanilla a bit, but I would still classify it as lore friendly. The goal has been to make a mix of metal and obsidian, with a touch of demonic style! Let me know in the comments if you think I have succeeded or in general just want to provide a bit of feedback! 

If you do have a super awesome idea on yet another alternative version then I am also all ears! 


[size=5][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Q5ugNJD.png[/img][/center]
[/size]There are two different versions up. 
The 4k version: 
4k DXT5 compressed diffuse and normal map as well as a 1k DXT1 compressed reflection mask. 

The 2k version:
2k DXT5 compressed diffuse and normal map as well as a 1k DXT1 compressed reflection mask. 

I will not be uploading a 1k version since imo the amount of detail I have put in gets a bit too washed out.. especially the normal map will suffer quite a bit at lower resolutions. Also it is quite easy to get a program that can resize at the click of a button if you need it. 


[youtube]TdffVlpuWuE[/youtube]
[size=5][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Doyq7NC.png[/img][/center][/size]
It is simple textures and meshes use your mod manager to install and remove like any other. Folder structure should be correct! 
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/mWIoZXq.png[/img][/center]
Bethesda for the game and all the goodies to play with!
Sparrowprince for lots of help and suggestions
Mangaclub and Benhat for beta testing and providing feedback. 
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/2RezCmn.png[/img][/center]
If you want to use these assets in your own mod, please ask me first! I will most likely agree it is the best idea since icecream! 
I do not give permission for these assets to be redistributed to other sites then the Nexus.
author: Aiyen
